name: Fartbarf Grey Slime
description: A slimy variant of the original Fartbarf angular OG logo. This one is black and white on a light grey shirt.

name: Fartbarf Blood & Guts
description:
A gruesome variant of the original Fartbarf angular OG logo. This one is red and white on a black shirt.

(Offered in both Boys and Girls styles)

name: Fartbarf Blood & Guts (Girls)
description:
A gruesome variant of the original Fartbarf angular OG logo. This one is red and white on a black shirt.

(Offered in both Boys and Girls styles)

name: Fartbarf Master of the 5 Count (With Free Track Download)
description:
Fartbarf Bloody Fartbarf! Remember back when bands had individual shirts for individual songs?! We do, and we liked it!

<iframe width="100%" height="166" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://w.soundcloud.com/player/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fapi.soundcloud.com%2Ftracks%2F97448438"></iframe>

Single pass purple and grey plastisol ink on black 50/50 shirt!

Measurements: 
Medium 
Pit to Pit: 20" 
Neck to Bottom Seam: 25.5"

Large 
Pit to Pit: 21.5" 
Neck to Bottom Seam: 27"

Extra Large 
Pit to Pit: 23" 
Neck to Bottom Seam: 28.5"

Sorry ladies :( You'll have to tailor your own, or shrink this one to fit.


Once purchased, download information will be emailed to you.

name: Fartbarf Norway (2-Sided)
description:
Limited edition Black Metal Tee. Pure white plastisol ink on black fitted shirt.

- Fartbarf Black Metal logo on front
- "Post-Neanderthal Analogue Synthesists" lettered in Olde-English on back

Measurements:
Medium
Pit to Pit: 20"
Neck to Bottom Seam: 25.5"

Large
Pit to Pit: 21.5"
Neck to Bottom Seam: 27"

Extra Large
Pit to Pit: 23"
Neck to Bottom Seam: 28.5"


Sorry ladies :( You'll have to tailor your own, or shrink this one to fit.

name: Fartbarf OG Logo (Girls)
description:
Original Fartbarf angular logo. Extremely vibrant red plastisol ink on black fitted shirt.

Measurements:
Small
Pit to Pit: 16"
Neck to Bottom Seam: 21.5"

Medium
Pit to Pit: 17"
Neck to Bottom Seam: 22.5"

Large
Pit to Pit: 18"
Neck to Bottom Seam: 23"

Youth Extra Large
Fit's like a very small boys cut shirt.

name: Fartbarf User Patch Sheet Hoodie
description:
**Limited run of 15 total**

Pullover Hoodie. White plastisol ink printed on black Fruit of the Loom 50/50's.

This item is extremely limited, and was created with the option of personal customization in mind.

The design is modelled directly after the patch sheets supplied with the original and beloved Arp Odyssey MK1 analog synthesizer in 1972.

http://tinyurl.com/arpodysseymk1

Way back in the 1970's, presets on electronic instruments weren't an option. What the player had to do was quickly jot down notes and slider positions as a visual reference to get back to the desired "patch" when they wanted to recreate a certain sound later on.

**With this sweatshirt, we've decided that you should create your own user patch, or use one of our favorite ones supplied with your order, and customize your hoodie to suit your taste! You will receive a printed assortment of Fartbarf Synthesizer Patch Sheets, as well as a fabric paint pen of a random color. Once you've picked out your favorite one, use the supplied paint pen to customize your sweatshirt into a 1 of a kind Fartbarf exclusive that's been created for you by you! Yay for arts & crafts!

These fit true to size. A small is SMALL. Will fit girls no problemo.

name: Fartbarf Synth Shredder Sticker
description:
Check out this radical full color sticker adaptation of one of our favorite childhood memories. This Fartbarf Neanderthal Synth Shredder looks good on anything. It's 4 inches, die-cut and UV treated with a white border, so no matter where ya stick it, it's gonna show up good for a long time.

Like the other sticker, the more you buy, the cheaper they get.

** (You can mix and match sticker packs, and still score the sweet deal, just make sure to write a note upon checkout on how you wanna break em down)

name: Large Fartbarf is fun. Bumper Sticker
description:
Large (8.5" x 2.75") silkscreened "Fartbarf is fun." slogan bumper sticker!
Red and White on top of Black.

The more you buy, the cheaper they get. These stickers are so big, they can be cut into 2 individual stickers if you want.

(One will be included for free on orders over $50.00 USD)

** (You can mix and match sticker packs, and still score the sweet deal, just make sure to write a note upon checkout on how you wanna break em down)
